thread.title: Sobbing Mets fan dials Mike Francesa to call out Matt Harvey (AUDIO)
thread.title_full: Sobbing Mets fan dials Mike Francesa to call out Matt Harvey (AUDIO)

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: Sobbing Mets fan dials Mike Francesa to call out Matt Harvey (AUDIO)
text:
PLUS: The last time Chase Utley took out Tejada, Carlos Beltran was upset 
As you'll see above ( via samspinchat ) Will from Queens dialed into Mike Francesa's Sunday show on WFAN and sounded as if he was in tears as he opined it was Matt Harvey's final chance to "step up" and do something major for the Mets in Game 3. 
"Will, are you crying?" Francesa responded. "Geez. ... Will, c'mon, calm down, it's Sunday morning." 
We'll see if Harvey can turn Will's frown upside down.
